metadata.description: Audio separation with SAM Audio. Isolate any sound using natural languageâ€”professional-grade audio editing made simple for creators, researchers, and accessibility applications.

SamAudioSpanSeparateInput.description: Input for temporal span-based audio separation.

prompt.description: Text prompt describing the sound to isolate. Optional but recommended - helps the model identify what type of sound to extract from the span.
prompt.title: Prompt

spans.description: Time spans where the target sound occurs which should be isolated.
spans.title: Spans

trim_to_span.description: Trim output audio to only include the specified span time range. If False, returns the full audio length with the target sound isolated throughout.
trim_to_span.title: Trim To Span

audio_url.description: URL of the audio file to process.
audio_url.title: Audio Url

reranking_candidates.description: Number of candidates to generate and rank. Higher improves quality but increases latency and cost. Requires text prompt; ignored for span-only separation.
reranking_candidates.title: Reranking Candidates

SamAudioSpanSeparateInput.title: SAMAudioSpanInput

duration.description: Duration of the output audio in seconds.
duration.title: Duration

sample_rate.description: Sample rate of the output audio in Hz.
sample_rate.title: Sample Rate

AudioTimeSpan.description: A time span indicating where the target sound occurs.

end.description: End time of the span in seconds
end.title: End

start.description: Start time of the span in seconds
start.title: Start

include.description: Whether to include (True) or exclude (False) sounds in this span
include.title: Include

AudioTimeSpan.title: AudioTimeSpan

KlingVideoCreateVoiceInput.title: CreateVoiceInput

voice_url.title: Voice Url
voice_url.description: URL of the voice audio file. Supports .mp3/.wav audio or .mp4/.mov video. Duration must be 5-30 seconds with clean, single-voice audio.

KlingVideoCreateVoiceInput.description: Request model for creating a custom voice.

KlingVideoCreateVoiceOutput.title: CreateVoiceOutput

voice_id.title: Voice Id
voice_id.description: Unique identifier for the created voice

KlingVideoCreateVoiceOutput.description: Response model for creating a custom voice.

success.description: Whether the request was cancelled successfully.

metadata.description: SOTA stemming model for voice, drums, bass, guitar and more.

info.title: Queue OpenAPI for fal-ai/demucs
info.description: The OpenAPI schema for the fal-ai/demucs queue.

segment_length.title: Segment Length
segment_length.description: Length in seconds of each segment for processing. Smaller values use less memory but may reduce quality. Default is model-specific.

output_format.title: Output Format
output_format.description: Output audio format for the separated stems

stems.title: Stems
stems.description: Specific stems to extract. If None, extracts all available stems. Available stems depend on model: vocals, drums, bass, other, guitar, piano (for 6s model)

overlap.title: Overlap
overlap.description: Overlap between segments (0.0 to 1.0). Higher values may improve quality but increase processing time.

model.title: Model
model.description: Demucs model to use for separation

audio_url.title: Audio Url
audio_url.description: URL of the audio file to separate into stems

shifts.title: Shifts
shifts.description: Number of random shifts for equivariant stabilization. Higher values improve quality but increase processing time.

guitar.description: Separated guitar audio file (only available for 6s models)

piano.description: Separated piano audio file (only available for 6s models)

file_size.title: File Size
file_size.description: The size of the file in bytes.

file_name.title: File Name
file_name.description: The name of the file. It will be auto-generated if not provided.

content_type.title: Content Type
content_type.description: The mime type of the file.

url.title: Url
url.description: The URL where the file can be downloaded from.

schema.description: Whether to include logs (`1`) in the response or not (`0`).

success.description: Whether the request was cancelled successfully.

metadata.description: A audio understanding model to analyze audio content and answer questions about what's happening in the audio based on user prompts.

info.title: Queue OpenAPI for fal-ai/audio-understanding
info.description: The OpenAPI schema for the fal-ai/audio-understanding queue.

examples: What is being discussed in this audio?
What emotions are expressed in this audio?
What is the main topic of this conversation?
prompt.title: Prompt
prompt.description: The question or prompt about the audio content.

detailed_analysis.title: Detailed Analysis
detailed_analysis.description: Whether to request a more detailed analysis of the audio

audio_url.title: Audio Url
audio_url.description: URL of the audio file to analyze

examples: Based on the audio, this appears to be a business meeting discussing quarterly sales results. The speakers are analyzing performance metrics and discussing strategies for the upcoming quarter. The tone is professional and collaborative, with multiple participants contributing to the discussion.
output.title: Output
output.description: The analysis of the audio content based on the prompt

schema.description: Whether to include logs (`1`) in the response or not (`0`).

success.description: Whether the request was cancelled successfully.

metadata.description: Generate high quality music and sound effects using Stable Audio 2.5 from StabilityAI

examples: Post rock, guitars, bass, strings, euphoric, up-lifting, moody, flowing, raw, epic
prompt.description: The prompt to guide the audio generation
prompt.title: Prompt

strength.title: Strength
strength.description: Sometimes referred to as denoising, this parameter controls how much influence the `audio_url` parameter has on the generated audio. A value of 0 would yield audio that is identical to the input. A value of 1 would be as if you passed in no audio at all.

sync_mode.description: If `True`, the media will be returned as a data URI and the output data won't be available in the request history.
sync_mode.title: Sync Mode

num_inference_steps.title: Num Inference Steps
num_inference_steps.description: The number of steps to denoise the audio for

guidance_scale.title: Guidance Scale
guidance_scale.description: How strictly the diffusion process adheres to the prompt text (higher values make your audio closer to your prompt).

total_seconds.title: Total Seconds
total_seconds.description: The duration of the audio clip to generate. If not provided, it will be set to the duration of the input audio.

seed.description: The random seed used for generation
seed.title: Seed

file_size.description: The size of the file in bytes.
file_size.title: File Size

file_name.description: The name of the file. It will be auto-generated if not provided.
file_name.title: File Name

content_type.description: The mime type of the file.
content_type.title: Content Type

url.description: The URL where the file can be downloaded from.
url.title: Url

schema.description: Whether to include logs (`1`) in the response or not (`0`).

success.description: Whether the request was cancelled successfully.

info.title: Queue OpenAPI for sonauto/v2/extend
info.description: The OpenAPI schema for the sonauto/v2/extend queue.

prompt.title: Prompt
prompt.description: A description of the track you want to generate. This prompt will be used to automatically generate the tags and lyrics unless you manually set them. For example, if you set prompt and tags, then the prompt will be used to generate only the lyrics.
examples: Add a beginning to the song

lyrics_prompt.title: Lyrics Prompt
lyrics_prompt.description: The lyrics sung in the generated song. An empty string will generate an instrumental track.

tags.title: Tags
tags.description: Tags/styles of the music to generate. You can view a list of all available tags at https://sonauto.ai/tag-explorer.

prompt_strength.title: Prompt Strength
prompt_strength.description: Controls how strongly your prompt influences the output. Greater values adhere more to the prompt but sound less natural. (This is CFG.)

output_bit_rate.title: Output Bit Rate
output_bit_rate.description: The bit rate to use for mp3 and m4a formats. Not available for other formats.

num_songs.title: Num Songs
num_songs.description: Generating 2 songs costs 1.5x the price of generating 1 song. Also, note that using the same seed may not result in identical songs if the number of songs generated is changed.

side.title: Side
side.description: Add more to the beginning (left) or end (right) of the song

balance_strength.title: Balance Strength
balance_strength.description: Greater means more natural vocals. Lower means sharper instrumentals. We recommend 0.7.

crop_duration.title: Crop Duration
crop_duration.description: Duration in seconds to crop from the selected side before extending from that side.

audio_url.description: The URL of the audio file to alter. Must be a valid publicly accessible URL.
audio_url.title: Audio Url

seed.title: Seed
seed.description: The seed to use for generation. Will pick a random seed if not provided. Repeating a request with identical parameters (must use lyrics and tags, not prompt) and the same seed will generate the same song.

extend_duration.title: Extend Duration
extend_duration.description: Duration in seconds to extend the song. If not provided, will attempt to automatically determine.

tags.title: Tags
tags.description: The style tags used for generation.

seed.title: Seed
seed.description: The seed used for generation. This can be used to generate an identical song by passing the same parameters with this seed in a future request.

extend_duration.title: Extend Duration
extend_duration.description: The duration in seconds that the song was extended by.

file_size.title: File Size
file_size.description: The size of the file in bytes.

file_name.title: File Name
file_name.description: The name of the file. It will be auto-generated if not provided.

content_type.title: Content Type
content_type.description: The mime type of the file.

url.title: Url
url.description: The URL where the file can be downloaded from.

schema.description: Whether to include logs (`1`) in the response or not (`0`).

success.description: Whether the request was cancelled successfully.

metadata.description: Extend the beginning or end of provided audio with lyrics and/or style using ACE-Step

info.title: Queue OpenAPI for fal-ai/ace-step/audio-outpaint
info.description: The OpenAPI schema for the fal-ai/ace-step/audio-outpaint queue.

number_of_steps.description: Number of steps to generate the audio.
number_of_steps.title: Number Of Steps

examples: lofi, hiphop, drum and bass, trap, chill
tags.title: Tags
tags.description: Comma-separated list of genre tags to control the style of the generated audio.

minimum_guidance_scale.description: Minimum guidance scale for the generation after the decay.
minimum_guidance_scale.title: Minimum Guidance Scale

extend_after_duration.description: Duration in seconds to extend the audio from the end.
extend_after_duration.title: Extend After Duration

lyrics.title: Lyrics
lyrics.description: Lyrics to be sung in the audio. If not provided or if [inst] or [instrumental] is the content of this field, no lyrics will be sung. Use control structures like [verse], [chorus] and [bridge] to control the structure of the song.

tag_guidance_scale.description: Tag guidance scale for the generation.
tag_guidance_scale.title: Tag Guidance Scale

scheduler.title: Scheduler
scheduler.description: Scheduler to use for the generation process.

extend_before_duration.description: Duration in seconds to extend the audio from the start.
extend_before_duration.title: Extend Before Duration

guidance_type.title: Guidance Type
guidance_type.description: Type of CFG to use for the generation process.

lyric_guidance_scale.description: Lyric guidance scale for the generation.
lyric_guidance_scale.title: Lyric Guidance Scale

guidance_interval.description: Guidance interval for the generation. 0.5 means only apply guidance in the middle steps (0.25 * infer_steps to 0.75 * infer_steps)
guidance_interval.title: Guidance Interval

guidance_interval_decay.description: Guidance interval decay for the generation. Guidance scale will decay from guidance_scale to min_guidance_scale in the interval. 0.0 means no decay.
guidance_interval_decay.title: Guidance Interval Decay

audio_url.title: Audio Url
audio_url.description: URL of the audio file to be outpainted.

seed.title: Seed
seed.description: Random seed for reproducibility. If not provided, a random seed will be used.

granularity_scale.description: Granularity scale for the generation process. Higher values can reduce artifacts.
granularity_scale.title: Granularity Scale

examples: lofi, hiphop, drum and bass, trap, chill

tags.description: The genre tags used in the generation process.

file_size.description: The size of the file in bytes.

file_name.title: File Name
file_name.description: The name of the file. It will be auto-generated if not provided.

content_type.title: Content Type
content_type.description: The mime type of the file.

url.title: Url
url.description: The URL where the file can be downloaded from.

schema.description: Whether to include logs (`1`) in the response or not (`0`).

success.description: Whether the request was cancelled successfully.

metadata.description: Clone dialog voices from a sample audio and generate dialogs from text prompts using the Dia TTS which leverages advanced AI techniques to create high-quality text-to-speech.

info.title: Queue OpenAPI for fal-ai/dia-tts/voice-clone
info.description: The OpenAPI schema for the fal-ai/dia-tts/voice-clone queue.

examples: [S1] Hello, how are you? [S2] I'm good, thank you. [S1] What's your name? [S2] My name is Dia. [S1] Nice to meet you. [S2] Nice to meet you too.
text.title: Text
text.description: The text to be converted to speech.

examples: [S1] Dia is an open weights text to dialogue model. [S2] You get full control over scripts and voices. [S1] Wow. Amazing. (laughs) [S2] Try it now on Fal.
ref_text.title: Reference Text for the Reference Audio
ref_text.description: The reference text to be used for TTS.

ref_audio_url.title: Reference Audio URL
ref_audio_url.description: The URL of the reference audio file.

file_size.description: The size of the file in bytes.

content_type.description: The mime type of the file.

metadata.description: Isolate audio tracks using ElevenLabs advanced audio isolation technology.

info.title: Queue OpenAPI for fal-ai/elevenlabs/audio-isolation
info.description: The OpenAPI schema for the fal-ai/elevenlabs/audio-isolation queue.

video_url.description: Video file to use for audio isolation. Either `audio_url` or `video_url` must be provided.
video_url.title: Video Url

audio_url.description: URL of the audio file to isolate voice from
audio_url.title: Audio Url

timestamps.description: Timestamps for each word in the generated speech. Only returned if `timestamps` is set to True in the request.
timestamps.title: Timestamps
